raw_json.html_title: Share Your Shiny Expertise at ShinyConf 2025! | R-bloggers
raw_json.main_html:
Share Your Shiny Expertise at ShinyConf 2025!

Posted on January 29, 2025 by Joanna Moko-azarewicz in R bloggers | 0 Comments

[This article was first published on Tag: r - Appsilon | Enterprise R Shiny Dashboards, and kindly contributed to R-bloggers]. (You can report issue about the content on this page here)
Want to share your content on R-bloggers? click here if you have a blog, or here if you don't.

Hey Shiny Enthusiasts!

ShinyConf 2025 is just around the corner, and were thrilled to invite you to be a part of it! Whether youve been working with Shiny for years or just dipped your toes into the world of interactive web apps, this is your chance to share your journey, your innovations, and those lightbulb moments with the community.

Why Should You Submit?

Were all about bringing together people who love Shiny as much as we do at Appsilon. Your talk could be the one that sparks a new idea or solves a tricky problem for someone else.

Plus, its a great way to connect with other like-minded folks and showcase your work to a global audience.

Key Details Youll Want to Know:

  • Submission Deadline: February 2, 2025
  • Notification of Acceptance: February 21, 2025
  • Conference Dates:
    • Workshops: April 9, 2025
    • Main Conference: April 10-11, 2025
  • Where? Its all happening online, so you can join from wherever you are!
  • What Were Looking For: Talks, workshops, and Shiny app showcases on topics like real-world case studies, advanced Shiny programming, enterprise deployment, and more! Were looking for fresh perspectives from developers at all experience levels (Both R and Python topics are welcome!).

Join a Thriving Community!

Over 1,000 Shiny enthusiasts from around the world have already registered for ShinyConf 2025! If you havent signed up yet, nows the perfect timeits completely free and accessible to anyone, anywhere. Dont miss out on this opportunity to be part of a global event thats all about sharing knowledge, learning, and growing together.

Register Now: https://www.shinyconf.com/

Need Some Tips for Succesful Proposal? Weve Got You Covered!

  1. Tell Your Shiny Story: Share your journey with Shiny your challenges, breakthroughs, and what youve learned. Real, relatable stories resonate and inspire.
  2. Focus on Innovation & Impact: Highlight how your talk offers a novel approach or solution. Emphasize the clear benefits and practical applications for the Shiny community.
  3. Keep It Clear and Passionate: Your proposal doesnt need to be perfect. Show your passion and present your ideas in a way thats accessible and interesting to a diverse audience.
  4. Showcase Technical Depth: Provide a clear technical foundation with an appropriate complexity level. Ensure your topic has a well-defined scope thats manageable and engaging.
  5. Be Yourself: Your unique perspective is what makes your session special. Let your personality shine through and connect with the audience.

Need Some Inspiration? Check Out These Highlights from ShinyConf 2024:

Meet the Program Committee:

Our amazing program committee is made up of Shiny enthusiasts who are excited to see what youve got to offer. Theyre looking for sessions that are informative, engaging, and most importantly, fun!

We cant wait to see what youve been working on.

Submit Your Proposal Here: https://sessionize.com/shiny-conf-2025/

Stay tuned for updates, and dont forget to follow us on social media!

Lets make ShinyConf 2025 the best one yet!

The post appeared first on appsilon.com/blog/.

Related

To leave a comment for the author, please follow the link and comment on their blog: Tag: r - Appsilon | Enterprise R Shiny Dashboards.
R-bloggers.com offers daily e-mail updates about R news and tutorials about learning R and many other topics. Click here if you're looking to post or find an R/data-science job.
